name: Try{Catch}
description:
Created by Leroy Bird in 48 hours for AIE's GameJam - Areas of Game Development!  Dear valuable employee: Jump onto your FishStation 2000 & boot up Scrumble 2022, we have a very special task for you to undertake! Please use your business mandated Gizmo UFO to clean the project  of errors, & also use our Personal Software Buddies:  Shop Shark,  R&D Raccoon & last but not least Clumsy Kelvin the computer bunny. So what are you waiting for GET BACK TO WORK!

Game Objective:

Collect the errors and exchange them with 'Shop Shark' to get Component points which you can use to buy research at 'Raccoon & Development'. If a error goes of screen the scene view in game will begin to break, on your fourth you're out!

Controls:

  • [ E ] -  ( Use the UFO, must be close or touching with mouse)
  • [Mouse 1]  - (Activate magnet, UFO mode only)
  • [Esc]  - (Quits the game early)
  • [Mouse 1] - (click on R&D button, Mouse mode only)

Disclaimer:

The game closes itself when you get an ending,  this is intentional.  The game also contains elements that might impact  people with photosensitive epilepsy,  for reference both the endings of the game contain particle explosions with bright colors. 

 Thanks for playing!
